overview: WW2 is coming to a close in Europe. The allies have the German army on the retreat. They have cut off their supply lines and are pushing east toward Hamburg. Soldaten Von Keinem Land follows the last two German soldiers left in a platoon of 15. They are pushed to the edge physically, mentally, and emotionally by the horrors of war. But through the shelling, gunfire, and misery they learn about each other, and find they have one thing in common... hatred for the Nazi's.
tagline: A war film by Josh Eshenour
title: Soldiers of No Country
